Is this lag consistent?  Based on the information you've provided, I can't say for sure if this is a routing issue or maybe packet loss due to a weak network.  We can find out more, though!  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going wrong.  You'll also get a result of troubleshooting instructions specific to your issue.  This should help out!
